name: 劉宗瑜
objective:
C/C++程式設計實務C LANGUAGE

C/C++至今仍是產業界最流行的程式語言，舉凡硬體、軟體的設計，到韌體、系統的開發。 C++是基於C語言的基礎的物件導向程式語言。C++與C相容，並且使得軟體開發更容易，分工清楚，增加開發效率。對於學會使用其他OOP程式語言（如：Java），學習C++將使得在學習這類OOP語言輕鬆許多。 
C / C++ is still the most popular programming language in the industry today such as hardware, software, firmware and system development. C++ is based on the C language with object-oriented programming language. C++ is compatible with C, and make software development easier because of a clear division of labor and development efficiency. For learning other OOP programming languages (eg, Java), learning C ++ makes learning OOP languages a lot easier.
本課程之內容包話了：C/C++程式寫作技巧、常用之資料結構、C++之OOP觀念與實作。
